Class PurchaseView

java.lang.Object
  PurchaseView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, SHPRCConstants
public class PurchaseView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, SHPRCConstants

Serves as the view in the MVC framework and displays products to be added to a purchase and the products in a purchase.

Version:
1.0 03/20/2013
Author:
Sophi Newman
